testsuite.name: automationexerciseshoping.checkElement
testsuite.system-out: Verify that user gets an error message if trying to log in without entering username and password Error message displayed correctly: 'Please fill out this field' Verify the sign-up process with all fields 1. Enter the username in username textfield 2. Enter the Email in Email textfield 3. Click on the SignUp button 5. Enter the password in the password field Password successfully entered
1. Go to the Web Application 2. Check the visibility of Signup/login option link 3. Verify the 'New User Signup' text is displayed 4. 'New User Signup!' text is displayed correctly
